002// Open Source Software; you can modify and/or share it under the terms of

004
005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command;
006
007import static edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.util.ErrorMessages.requireNonNullParam;
008
009import java.util.Map;
010import java.util.function.Supplier;
011
012/**
013 * A command composition that runs one of a selection of commands, either using a selector and a key
014 * to command mapping, or a supplier that returns the command directly at runtime.
015 *
016 * <p>The rules for command compositions apply: command instances that are passed to it cannot be
017 * added to any other composition or scheduled individually, and the composition requires all
018 * subsystems its components require.
019 *
020 * <p>This class is provided by the NewCommands VendorDep
021 */
022public class SelectCommand extends CommandBase {
023  private final Map<Object, Command> m_commands;
024  private final Supplier<Object> m_selector;
025  private final Supplier<Command> m_toRun;
026  private Command m_selectedCommand;
027  private boolean m_runsWhenDisabled = true;
028  private InterruptionBehavior m_interruptBehavior = InterruptionBehavior.kCancelIncoming;
029
030  /**
031   * Creates a new selectcommand.
032   *
033   * @param commands the map of commands to choose from
034   * @param selector the selector to determine which command to run
035   */
036  public SelectCommand(Map<Object, Command> commands, Supplier<Object> selector) {
037    m_commands = requireNonNullParam(commands, "commands", "SelectCommand");
038    m_selector = requireNonNullParam(selector, "selector", "SelectCommand");
039
040    CommandScheduler.getInstance()
041        .registerComposedCommands(commands.values().toArray(new Command[] {}));
042
043    m_toRun = null;
044
045    for (Command command : m_commands.values()) {
046      m_requirements.addAll(command.getRequirements());
047      m_runsWhenDisabled &= command.runsWhenDisabled();
048      if (command.getInterruptionBehavior() == InterruptionBehavior.kCancelSelf) {
049        m_interruptBehavior = InterruptionBehavior.kCancelSelf;
050      }
051    }
052  }
053
054  /**
055   * Creates a new selectcommand.
056   *
057   * @param toRun a supplier providing the command to run
058   * @deprecated Replace with {@link ProxyCommand}
059   */
060  @Deprecated
061  public SelectCommand(Supplier<Command> toRun) {
062    m_commands = null;
063    m_selector = null;
064    m_toRun = requireNonNullParam(toRun, "toRun", "SelectCommand");
065
066    // we have no way of checking the underlying command, so default.
067    m_runsWhenDisabled = false;
068    m_interruptBehavior = InterruptionBehavior.kCancelSelf;
069  }
070
071  @Override
072  public void initialize() {
073    if (m_selector != null) {
074      if (!m_commands.keySet().contains(m_selector.get())) {
075        m_selectedCommand =
076            new PrintCommand(
077                "SelectCommand selector value does not correspond to" + " any command!");
078        return;
079      }
080      m_selectedCommand = m_commands.get(m_selector.get());
081    } else {
082      m_selectedCommand = m_toRun.get();
083    }
084    m_selectedCommand.initialize();
085  }
086
087  @Override
088  public void execute() {
089    m_selectedCommand.execute();
090  }
091
092  @Override
093  public void end(boolean interrupted) {
094    m_selectedCommand.end(interrupted);
095  }
096
097  @Override
098  public boolean isFinished() {
099    return m_selectedCommand.isFinished();
100  }
101
102  @Override
103  public boolean runsWhenDisabled() {
104    return m_runsWhenDisabled;
105  }
106
107  @Override
108  public InterruptionBehavior getInterruptionBehavior() {
109    return m_interruptBehavior;
110  }
111}
